import React, { useState } from 'react' import productview from './productview.css' import Header from './Header' import Footer from './Footer' function ProductView() { const list = localStorage.getItem('productdata') const [data, setData] = useState(JSON.parse(list)) const[ sizecolor, setSizecolor] = useState(false) const[ sizecolor1, setSizecolor1] = useState(false) const[ sizecolor2, setSizecolor2] = useState(false) const[ sizecolor3, setSizecolor3] = useState(false) const[ sizecolor4, setSizecolor4] = useState(false) return (


setSizecolor(true)&setSizecolor1(false)&setSizecolor2(false)&setSizecolor3(false)&setSizecolor4(false)} style={{width:"10%", height:"6vh", border:"1px solid black", display:"flex", justifyContent:"center", alignItems:"center",backgroundColor:sizecolor?"#D2B44B":null}}>
setSizecolor(false)&setSizecolor1(true)&setSizecolor2(false)&setSizecolor3(false)&setSizecolor4(false)} style={{width:"10%", height:"6vh", border:"1px solid black", display:"flex", justifyContent:"center", alignItems:"center",backgroundColor:sizecolor1?"#D2B44B":null}}>
setSizecolor(false)&setSizecolor1(false)&setSizecolor2(true)&setSizecolor3(false)&setSizecolor4(false)} style={{width:"10%", height:"6vh", border:"1px solid black", display:"flex", justifyContent:"center", alignItems:"center",backgroundColor:sizecolor2?"#D2B44B":null}}>
setSizecolor(false)&setSizecolor1(false)&setSizecolor2(false)&setSizecolor3(true)&setSizecolor4(false)} style={{width:"10%", height:"6vh", border:"1px solid black", display:"flex", justifyContent:"center", alignItems:"center",backgroundColor:sizecolor3?"#D2B44B":null}}>
setSizecolor(false)&setSizecolor1(false)&setSizecolor2(false)&setSizecolor3(false)&setSizecolor4(true)} style={{width:"10%", height:"6vh", border:"1px solid black", display:"flex", justifyContent:"center", alignItems:"center",backgroundColor:sizecolor4?"#D2B44B":null}}>



















Shipping


) } export default ProductView
